sentences.en: ...a magic potion that will make Siegfried forget Brunnhilde and fall in love with Gutrune.
sentences.cn: …一种会使齐格弗里德忘掉布伦希德尔德而爱上古特鲁内娜的魔剂。

sentences.en: But what about a pill or potion to make you better behaved?
sentences.cn: 但药片能够改善人的行为,信 么 ?

sentences.en: Changed the Crazy Alchemist Potion so it always gives health and mana.
sentences.cn: 改变了疯狂炼金师药水的效果,使其一定给予生命和魔法值.

sentences.en: Deliver your awesome power and transform my potion.
sentences.cn: 用你们神圣的力量幻化我的药剂吧.

sentences.en: I will make you a potion that will turn you into a human for three days.
sentences.cn: 我给你一剂药你吃下去能让变成人三天.

sentences.en: I wonder what would happen if I drank this potion.
sentences.cn: 我想知道如果我喝掉这药水会发生什么.

sentences.en: Is it real coffee or some Scandinavian CHristmas potion?
sentences.cn: 是真的咖啡还是一些斯堪的纳维亚的基督药?

sentences.en: Love is the best refreshing potion.
sentences.cn: 爱情是生活最好的提神剂。

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the hair anti - aging function of decreasing Zishui Qinggan potion.
sentences.cn: 目的:探讨加减滋水清肝饮抗毛发衰老的作用机理.

sentences.en: Potion ingredients are available for student use from the Student Store cupboard.
sentences.cn: 学生可以从学生储藏柜中取用魔药成分.

sentences.en: She charmed him with a magic potion hidden in his food.
sentences.cn: 她在他的食物中加了具有魔力的药水,从而迷惑了他.

sentences.en: She lifted the bottle and drank the magic potion.
sentences.cn: 她拿起瓶子服下了这帖神奇药水.

sentences.en: Sneaking Potion: Increases Stealth a great deal for 30 sec.
sentences.cn: 坚固药剂: 增加防御2500在2分钟内.

sentences.en: Then, the sea witch put the magic potion into a bottle.
sentences.cn: 接着, 巫婆就把神奇药水倒进瓶子里.

sentences.en: They contain a special potion that can make anything smaller.
sentences.cn: 是一种神奇的药水,可以让任何东西变小.

trans.tran_en: A potion is a drink that contains medicine, poison, or something that is supposed to have magic powers
